sentences.sentence: Monitor the subordinates to strictly obey the safety rule such as LOTO.
sentences.translation: 监督、指导班组人员严格执行公司安全规定，如LOTO。

sentences.sentence: LOTO sheet metal production (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. is specialized in sheet metal processing joint venture, located in Jiading District in Nanxiang Hi-Tech Park.
sentences.translation: 乐图钣金制作(上海)有限公司是专业从事钣金加工的合资企业，位于上海市嘉定区南翔高科技园区内。
